00035 //union SDL_Event;
00036 typedef SDL_Event EventItem; // for now, we can change that later
00037 
00038 class _Event;
00039 template< typename _Data > class Event;
00040 
00041 class CustomEventHandler : public Action {
00042 public:
00043  virtual int handle() = 0;
00044  virtual const _Event* owner() const = 0;
00045  virtual CustomEventHandler* copy(_Event* newOwner = NULL) const = 0;
00046  virtual ~CustomEventHandler() {}
00047 };
00048 
00049 template< typename _Data >
00050 class EventThrower : public CustomEventHandler {
00051 public:
00052  Event<_Data>* m_event;
00053  _Data m_data;
00054  EventThrower(Event<_Data>* e, _Data d) : m_event(e), m_data(d) {}
00055  virtual int handle() {
00056   m_event->occurred( m_data );
00057   return 0;
00058  }
00059  virtual const _Event* owner() const { return m_event; }
00060  virtual CustomEventHandler* copy(_Event* newOwner) const {
00061   EventThrower* th = new EventThrower(*this);
00062   if(newOwner) th->m_event =  (Event<_Data>*) newOwner;
00063   return th;
00064  }
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 struct EventQueueIntern;
00069 
00070 class EventQueue {
00071 private:
00072  EventQueueIntern* data;
00073 public:
00074  EventQueue();
00075  ~EventQueue();
00076 
00077  // Polls for currently pending events.
00078  bool poll(EventItem& e);
00079 
00080  // Waits indefinitely for the next available event.
00081  bool wait(EventItem& e);
00082 
00083  /* Add an event to the event queue.
00084   * This function returns true on success
00085   * or false if there was some error.
00086   */
00087  bool push(const EventItem& e);
00088  bool push(Action* eh);
00089 
00090  // goes through all CustomEventHandler and copies them if oldOwner is matching
00091  void copyCustomEvents(const _Event* oldOwner, _Event* newOwner);
00092 
00093  // removes all CustomEventHandler with owner
00094  void removeCustomEvents(const _Event* owner);
00095 };
00096 
00097 extern EventQueue* mainQueue;
